name: sap-integration-suite-client
author: Contiva GmbH <mail@contiva.com>
description: SAP Cloud Platform Integration API Client

scripts.release:patch: git push && npm version patch && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: git push && npm version minor && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: git push && npm version major && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:github: cp package.json package.json.backup && npm pkg set name='@contiva/sap-integration-suite-client' && npm publish --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com && mv package.json.backup package.json
scripts.release:all:patch: git push && npm version patch && npm publish && npm run publish:github && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:all:minor: git push && npm version minor && npm publish && npm run publish:github && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:all:major: git push && npm version major && npm publish && npm run publish:github && git push && git push --tags
